justification: Assumes Team B “desperately needs” an RB despite having Tier 1/2 RBs, and ignores B’s preference for pocket passers/possession WRs and willingness to buy injured players. Asking for B’s Tier 1 QB (Reed) plus a WR for A’s Tier 5 workhorse is value-incoherent and unlikely given B’s conservative style and win-now needs. It also contradicts Team A’s preference for workhorse RBs by trading their only one. Rationale is generic and thin, lacking player-tier or role-based justification; 0.65 acceptance is unrealistic.
